002.comments: This course is restricted to students in the Bachelor of Media Studies program, and is not open to general students. For inquiries, please email arts.mediastudies@ubc.ca.
002.building: Leon and Thea Koerner University Centre
instructors: in one of these programs: BMS
002.totalRemaining: in one of these programs: BMS

description: Introduces network concepts and methods for exploring social and organizational connectivity for work, socializing, and knowledge production. Examines impact of social media on connections that span space and place; peer production on authority structures; ubiquitous mobile connectivity on daily life.
